January.theme: Everything on dry land died.

February.occasion: Abaasua Retreat/YAF Evangelism Week/Women Workers' L'ship Course
February.theme: How majestic is your name in all the earth.
BE A DISCIPLE OF CHRIST.
I will give thanks to the LORD with my whole heart.
But the needy will not always be forgotten.
He says to himself, "Nothing will shake me."
But you, 0 God do see trouble and grief.
The LORD is on his heavenly throne.
And the words of the LORD are flawless.
6th Sunday after Epiphany. BLESSINGS AND WOES OF DISCIPLESHIP.
How long, O LORD?
The fool says in his heart, "There is no God."
Who may dwell in the LORD's sanctuary?
Keep me safe, O God, for in you I take refuge.
I have resolved that my mouth will not sin.
Keep me as the apple of your eye.
GO AND MAKE DISCIPLE OF ALL NATIONS: DISCIPLING THE CHILD.
The LORD is my rock, my fortress and my deliverer.
He rescued me from my powerful enemy.
To the faithful, you show yourself faithful.

February.occasion: Committee on Specialized Ministries / JY National Assembly
February.theme: The LORD lives!

March.theme: In the beginning was the Word.
The Word became flesh and made his dwelling among us.
LET THE GLORY OF THE LORD SHINE.
I have seen and testify that this is the Son of God.
Follow me.
Ash Wednesday ACCEPTABLE SACRIFICE Fill the jars with water; so they filled them to the brim. John 2:1-11
Then they believed the Scripture and the words that Jesus had spoken.
You must be born again.
He must become greater; I must become less.
TRUTHFULNESS IN WORSHIP.

March.occasion: GENERAL ASSEMBLY COUNCIL Youth & Students Week begins
March.theme: A spring of water welling up to eternal life.
God is Spirit and his worshippers must worship in spirit and in truth.
My food is to do the will of him who sent me and to finish his work.

March.occasion: GENERAL ASSEMBLY COUNCIL/Committee on Global Mission
March.theme: The man took Jesus at his word and he departed.
Get up! Pick up your mat and walk.
My Father is always at his work to this very day, and I too, am working.

March.occasion: YOUTH & STUDENTS' SUN. 2nd Sunday in Lent.
March.theme: DISCIPLING THE YOUTH TO DISCIPLE OTHERS.
1 do not accept praise from human beings.
Gather the pieces that are left over. Let nothing be wasted.
It is I; don't be afraid.
Do not work for food that spoils, but for food that endures to eternal life.
Jesus is the bread that came down from heaven.
Jesus purposefully stayed away from Judea because the Jews wanted to take his life.
LISTEN TO THE LORD AND LIVE.
Stop judging by mere appearances, and make a right judgment.
Have the authorities concluded that he is the Christ?
If anyone is thirsty, let him come to me and drink .
Neither do I condemn you. Go now and leave your life of sin.
The one who sent me is with me; he has not left me alone.
If you hold to my teaching, you are really my disciple.
INDEPENDENCE WITHOUT GOD IS SLAVERY.

April.theme: They also carried off Abraham's nephew Lot since he lived in Sodom.
Then Abram gave Melchizedek a tenth of everything.
Do not be afraid; I am your shield.
You shall name him Ishmael for the LORD has heard of your misery.
I am God Almighty; walk before me and be blameless.
Abraham fell facedown; he laughed.
YOUNG ADULTS' SUNDAY BUILDING A NEW NATION IN CHRIST.
Is anything too hard for the LORD?
Then Abraham interceded for Sodom and Gomorrah.
This fellow came here as an alien and now he wants to play the judge.
Flee for your lives! Don't look back and don't stop anywhere in the plain.
So both of Lot's daughters became pregnant by their father.
Then Abraham prayed to God.
SUFFERING FOR A PURPOSE.
Sarah became pregnant and bore a son to Abraham in his old age.
God heard the boy crying.
God is with you in everything you do_
God himself will provide lithe lamb for the burnt offering.
GOOD FRIDAY. DYING WITH CHRIST. Because you have done this, I will surely bless you. Genesis 22:13-24.

April.occasion: HOLY SATURDAY So Ephron's field in Machpelah was deeded to Abraham. Genesis 23:1-20

April.theme: CHRIST'S VICTORY OVER DEATH.
Make sure you do not take my son back there.
O LORD, God of my master Abraham, give me success today.
As for me, the LORD has led me on my journey.
The LORD before whom I have walked will send his angel with you.
This is from the LORD; we can say nothing to you one way or another.
His sons Isaac and Ishmael buried him.
STAND UP FOR JESUS.
What account will be given about your descendants?
Isaac prayed to the LORD on behalf of his wife, because she was barren.
